title: Metro
content: Designed by [William Addison Dwiggins](http://web.archive.org/web/20140904160924/http:/typophile.com/wiki/William%20Addison%20Dwiggins) for [Mergenthaler Linotype](http://web.archive.org/web/20140904160924/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Mergenthaler%20Linotype) under the direction of [C. H. Griffith](http://web.archive.org/web/20140904160924/http:/typophile.com/wiki/C%20H%20Griffith). Released 1937. Read more of Metro's history at [Linotype.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20140904160924/http:/www.linotype.com/7-2410-7/metroseries.html).
author: Miss Tiffany
